sentences.sContent: An alternative to monetary damages is an injunction prohibiting publication of the allegedly libelous material.
sentences.sContent_eng: An alternative to monetary damages is an injunction prohibiting publication of the allegedly libelous material.
sentences.sCn: 除经济赔偿之外的另一种做法是颁布禁令，禁止发表被指称诽谤的材料。

sentences.sContent: This borderline-libelous MTV advert produced for World Aids Day highlights how your partner's past conquests may come back to haunt them, and you.
sentences.sContent_eng: This borderline-libelous MTV advert produced for World Aids Day highlights how your partner's past conquests may come back to haunt them, and you.
sentences.sCn: 这则疑似诽谤的MTV广告为世界艾滋病日而作。 它强调了你以往的交往对象们也许会困扰你们。

synos.tran: 诽谤的；损害名誉的；用言语中伤他人的
